Column.Name: Plant_ID
Description: Plant identifier, starting at 1 in each population

Column.Name: plant_id
Description: Plant identifier, unique to each plant in the study

Column.Name: flower_id
Description: Flower identifier, unique to each flower in the study

Column.Name: Flower_id
Description: Flower identifier, unique within each population

Column.Name: Petal_width_mm
Description: Width of petals measured from photos

Column.Name: Petal_length_mm
Description: Length of petals measured from photos

Column.Name: Corola_area_mm2
Notes: Formula is 3.141519 x petal length x petal width
